title: Handle Level-2 Anomaly Alert
triggers: Anomaly alert raised with severity >= MEDIUM
steps: Open Dashboard > Alerts and click the newest L2 alert.
Verify the snapshot and 10s clip; confirm not a false positive.
Acknowledge the alert (Ack button) to freeze the SLA timer.
Create incident ticket in ServiceDesk with auto-filled context.
Notify Duty Manager via hotline and incident ticket @mention.
Start live monitoring of the camera for 2 minutes.
Attach supporting screenshots/clip to the ticket.
chunk_text: L2 anomaly handling: verify alert, acknowledge, create ticket, notify Duty Manager within 5 minutes, monitor live, attach evidence.

title: Safe Restart of Edge-Sentinel
steps: On the edge device, stop services: `sudo systemctl stop edge-sentinel.service`.
Wait for queue drain confirmation (RabbitMQ: edge queue depth == 0).
Restart: `sudo systemctl start edge-sentinel.service`.
Verify logs: `journalctl -u edge-sentinel -n 100 --no-pager`.
Confirm heartbeat visible in Dashboard > Devices within 30s.
chunk_text: Edge-Sentinel safe restart: stop service, drain queue, start service, verify logs and heartbeat.

title: Acknowledge & Annotate Alert
steps: Open alert details and review snapshot/clip.
Click 'Acknowledge' to start operator handling state.
Select annotation: True Positive / False Positive / Uncertain.
Add 1-line note and save.
chunk_text: Alert acknowledgement and annotation flow: review, acknowledge, label, note.

title: Identity Merge Approval
triggers: Merge proposal created with similarity >= tau_same
steps: Open Dashboard > Identities > Merge Proposals.
Review top-3 evidence tracks and similarity scores.
Approve if all evidence is consistent; otherwise reject and add note.
chunk_text: Identity merge approval: review evidence and scores, approve or reject; Data Steward notified.

title: Login & MFA
steps: Navigate to Sentinel login portal.
Enter credentials and complete MFA via authenticator app.
If MFA fails twice, use backup code or contact IT.
chunk_text: Login and MFA process; use backup or call IT on repeated failures.

title: Outage: Central Services
steps: Declare incident SEV-1 in ServiceDesk; notify on-call.
Check status of PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, and API gateway.
Run failover playbook if primary is down > 2 minutes.
Post update in #ops every 10 minutes until resolved.
chunk_text: Central outage handling: SEV-1, check DB/Rabbit/API, failover if >2m, post updates every 10m.

title: False Positive Handling
triggers: Operator marks alert as False Positive
steps: Select 'False Positive' annotation and choose reason.
Attach a frame showing the misclassification.
Submit to model-feedback queue for retraining pipeline.
chunk_text: False positive workflow: annotate, attach evidence, send to feedback queue.

title: Search & Assign Identity to Track
triggers: A new track requires identity assignment
steps: Open Dashboard > Sessions; select track.
Run 'Find Similar' to retrieve top-20 identities.
If similarity >= tau_same, link identity; else request supervisor review.
chunk_text: Assign identity to track using similarity threshold; escalate if below threshold.

title: Data Retention & Deletion
steps: Review retention job summary.
Approve deletion batches that meet policy criteria.
Export audit log of deletions.
chunk_text: Retention policy enforcement and deletion approvals; audit log required.

title: Access Revocation
steps: Disable SSO account and revoke API tokens.
Remove user from Role-Based Access groups.
Confirm access revoked by test login.
chunk_text: Revoke access steps: disable SSO, revoke tokens, remove RBAC roles, verify.

title: Update Attribute Thresholds
steps: Prepare change request with ROC metrics.
Update thresholds JSON in config repo via PR.
Deploy config via CI; monitor precision/recall for 24h.
chunk_text: Change thresholds via PR and CI; monitor metrics post-deploy.

title: Audit Log Review
steps: Export last 7 days of access and action logs.
Spot-check top 10 high-privilege actions.
File anomalies as tickets to Security.
chunk_text: Weekly audit: export logs, review high-privilege actions, file anomalies.
